Package com.company

Class Room

java.lang.Object
com.company.Room
public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
this class is used for reserving rooms it holds the characteristics of each room such as number , view , type , price and date that reserved

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Room​(int number, com.company.Room.View view, com.company.Room.Type type, int price)
    creat a new room with a given number , view , type and price
